aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.content: Marcus “heyoka” de Mello. I'm a non-binary from São Paulo, capital and I've always been passionate about competition. I discovered the world of e-Sports in 2015 in the game Call of Duty, I played for 2 years where I participated in 2 in-person championships. The game had a partnership with the Xbox platform where the championships took place and they migrated to Playstation, so I started working as an administrator and social media manager for several teams, including my own.

admMain.title: Administrator
admMain.content: I will be responsible for addressing all team demands and doing my best to ensure that players and staff can carry out their work in the best possible way. I am seeking an opportunity to lead and manage an ambitious and visionary esports organization. I am confident in my ability to take the organization to the next level and achieve the desired success.

admSkills.title: Skills
list: In-depth knowledge of the esports ecosystem

more.title: How We Can Work
more.desc: In addition to the main administrative functions, I am also available for:

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.content: An essential part of any team is representing its image to the public in the best way possible. I can participate in advertisements, assist with sponsorships, and generate content for social media such as behind-the-scenes and interviews.

events.title: Events
events.content: As I reside in São Paulo, I can accompany the team in in-person championships and events in general, where I will assist players and staff.

stream.title: Streams
stream.content: Generate daily entertainment and communication with various games, including the 'just chatting' category, to make the audience feel closer to the team.
